summon.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to order someone to come to a place
summon.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Robert summoned the waiter for the bill.
The president summoned Taylor to Washington.
He was summoned to attend an emergency meeting.
summon.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to officially order someone to come to a court of law
summon.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Hugh was summoned to appear before the magistrate.
summon.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to try very hard to have enough of something such as courage, energy, or strength, because you need it
summon.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: He had to summon the energy to finish the race.
